definition: ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale

sentences.english: Eventually it puts forward the focus of studying V-based solid solution type hydrogen stora…
sentences.chinese: 指出了今后钒基固溶体型贮氢材料应用研究的重点。

sentences.english: The effect of vanadium in cast iron and V - containing cast irons was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍钒在铸铁中的作用及含钒铸铁材料。

sentences.english: Therefore, formation of high valance vanadium oxide films was obtained.
sentences.chinese: 因此，形成价态更高的钒氧化物薄膜。

sentences.english: The method for determination of microphosphorus in the organic compounds by vanadium-molybdenum-yellow-spectrophotometry was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 采用磷钒钼黄比色法测定磷酸锌中磷含量。

sentences.english: Phosphorus content in zinc phosphate is determined by phosphorus vanadium molybdate yellow colorimetric method.
sentences.chinese: 采用磷钒钼黄比色法测定磷酸锌中磷含量。

sentences.english: Unlike sodium-sulfur batteries, vanadium-flow batteries don’t need to be heated to high temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 与硫化钠不同的是，液化钒电池不需要加热到高温。

sentences.english: Eventually it puts forward the focus of studying V-based solid solution type hydrogen storage material in further.
sentences.chinese: 指出了今后钒基固溶体型贮氢材料应用研究的重点。

sentences.english: The structure and properties of the RE-borovanadizing steels were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了稀土加入量对钢硼钒共渗组织和性能的影响。

sentences.english: Present situation is described of comprehensive utilization of Panzhihua Mine's resources of vanadium, titanium and iron.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了攀枝花钒钛铁资源的利用现状。

sentences.english: Scientists at the YVO closely monitor the Yellowstone region for such precursors.
sentences.chinese: 在钒酸钇科学家密切留意这类前体黄石地区。

sentences.english: The high-performance catalyst has heenused in a sulphur-burning sulphuric acid plant.
sentences.chinese: 高性能钒催化剂已工业应用于硫磺制酸系统。

sentences.english: Most Chiness crude oils are high in nickel and low in vanadium content.
sentences.chinese: 中国大多数原油中金属含量都是镍高钒低。

sentences.english: Approximately 80% of vanadium produced is used as ferrovanadium or as a steel additive.
sentences.chinese: 约80%的钒用于生产钒铁或作为合金钢的组成部分。

sentences.english: Ferro-vanadium making directly from atomizing vanadium slag was studied in our laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 对攀钢雾化钒渣直接冶炼钒铁，进行了实验室研究。

sentences.english: An inquiry is made into the analytical method for vanadium in the Benfield solution.
sentences.chinese: 对苯菲尔溶液中钒的分析测定方法进行了探讨。

sentences.english: It uses vanadium in both electrolytes.
sentences.chinese: 当时两种电解质均使用了钒化合物。
